website_summaries.verdict: Dry shampoo formula provides bouncy clean hair in a hurry.
pros: Even if you don't have time to wash your hair, this dry shampoo still gives you clean, bouncy hair
Time-release fragrance for great-smelling hair all day
cons: Can leave white residue if not used correctly

website_summaries.verdict: Celebrity-endorsed line delivers with the science to create a strong dry shampoo.
pros: The patented OFPMA molecule in this dry shampoo reduces friction and frizz in the hair
Makes hair smell fresh and crisp like you have just come out of the salon
cons: It might not suit curly hair types

customer_reviews.title: Not the real stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is not the real living proof dry shampoo- it doesn’t work at all. The label is in Spanish and the product doesn’t work like the real living proof dry shampoo. Plus you can’t return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It has one job and it failed.
customer_reviews.text: Sigh. I heard this brand was good so I thought I'd get the travel size to test it out. This stuff STINKS. Literally smells so strongly that it's basically perfume. Couldn't even air out the scent with my car windows rolled down. It left very noticeable white areas wherever I sprayed it (yes I know, brush it out, tousle with your fingers) but I could NOT get the white to go away! On top of that, it did nothing but make my hair even greasier! Would not absorb. Smell: terrible Effectiveness: none Value: zero
customer_reviews.author: K. Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hair day is right!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a lot of dry shampoos. On my fine but lots of stick straight hair- it shows grease after one day of not washing. Sprayed this in on day 2 of no shower and was pleasantly surprised at the non greasy , full bodied hair it left me with. I will say- if you are sensitive to smell this one may be a bit too strong in scent for you
customer_reviews.author: Chrisdee24

customer_reviews.title: REALLY strong smell
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works really well, except it could have provided a little bit more volume. I couldn't get past the smell, though. It was SO strong and smelled like I doused my head in perfume all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Lyce

customer_reviews.title: Old product?  Stopped working after three months.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product but this is the first time buying from this seller; within three months, both cans of the product i bought stopped working - no longer sprayed the cleaning powder just wet air. I contacted the seller to replace the cans and they refused. I wonder if the product they are selling is past its shelf life? I've bought this from Nordstrom in the past and it has lasted me more than a year (i use sparingly!).
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Scaduto

customer_reviews.title: If you are training your hair to not need to be washed, this is the best product!
customer_reviews.text: I had gotten to the point with my hair where I was having to wash it everyday, I knew the only way to train it to every other day was with a really good dry shampoo. I've tried others that just don't smell good or work at all. This has helped so much, and now I've gotten my hair to looking great for up to two days! My hair is stronger and healthy with the help of this product! It smells delicious and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Broken; waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This product came with a broken top so I can’t even use it. I wanted to return but there’s no return or exchange policy for this item. Very disappointed. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: I received the largest bottle of it and it has broken after maybe 3 uses. It is still almost completely full. It is a shame that it isn’t working because I love the dry shampoo. I won’t buy something I am unable to return when it is this expensive though.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Baker

customer_reviews.title: Favorite dry shampoo ever!
customer_reviews.text: I stumbled upon this product on Facebook. I bought the in shower style and fell in love so when I reordered I figured I try some other products. I was not disappointed. I color my hair with vibrant colors and I can't wash it regularly without the color fading fast. This dry shampoo makes my hair look like it was just washed and doesn't leave it feel grimy or crunchy like some other dry shampoos (and I've tried a TON!!). This whole product line is my new favorite. It really is living proof!!
customer_reviews.author: Lovelys

customer_reviews.title: Not the Best Dry Shampoo For me.
customer_reviews.text: This dry shampoo was by far my least favorite. I definitely do not recommend for people with dark hair. I have dark brown hair and it left a horrible white cast. Even after brushing through it and massaging it onto my scalp, you could still see some of it. It left my hair feeling not very clean. My hair felt stiff and when I would touch or run my fingers through, my fingers were white and sticky. Definitely not buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Gives hair a weird texture
customer_reviews.text: I've used dry shampoo for 10+ years. I now have 3 kids so it's a must! I wanted one that was more natural and less full of damaging chemicals, /9 I tried this one. It's weird. My hair texture is funky when I use it and the fragrance is so strong, our baby can't nap in our room after I use it in our bathroom. Don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KFam

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product before, and I usually love it. This is my first time ordering and having it shipped. I was only able to use it once before the sprayer quit working. I am unable to return the product as defective though because aerosol products can not be returned. This was very expensive for only a single use.
customer_reviews.author: D A Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. Was skeptical from reading other reviews but just went for it anyway. It does leave a white residue at first as to be expected... but it disappears very quickly as the powder absorbs the oil in your hair. Makes my hair 1,000x’s more manageable to style once my hair has reached that heavy oily stage where it just falls flat. This stuff brings it back to life! I’m a guy with lengths that range from 3-5 inches ontop with a side part and like to comb it all back while keeping volume and a natural wave. Highly recommended for anyone with similar hair.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Best dry shampoo I've ever tried!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this stuff! Found a review for it on Facebook & decided to give it a try. Will definitely buy it in the bigger bottle once this one is empty. The scent is really awesome too & I wasn't expecting that since the other dry shampoo brands I use don't smell too amazing. Plus, it really does make my hair look like I just finished washing it. The quality is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Great product - use very little in moderation!
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says it does - don't need a lot so don't complain of the expense. when i even used more than a quick fine mist it looked like my blonde hair went gray even when i tried to comb it in. moderation, everyone. worth it and id buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: amoc

customer_reviews.title: Works really well!
customer_reviews.text: I've used Living Proof dry shampoo several times, following the simple and quick directions on the bottle. I usually bend at the waist so all my hair falls forward and I can spray the hair from underneath. Let it be for 30 seconds, then massage through the hair and shake the hair. When I stand straight, my medium length hair is fluffy again and looks clean. Really a time-saver when you want to look nice, but don't have the half-hour or more that it takes to shampoo with water and blow-dry. Using this dry shampoo only takes a few minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Music Box Gal

customer_reviews.title: Not new, used and can't return!! Rip off
customer_reviews.text: Terrible purchase!!! This would be returned, but this item says that it is not eligible for return?! This was supposed to be a new can of dry shampoo, but arrived with no lid and feels nearly empty of product. I paid new price, but looks like I received someone's used product.
customer_reviews.author: Leean West

customer_reviews.title: Best so far!
customer_reviews.text: I have fine oily hair and I’ve tried so many times to oil train my hair and never could! Taking advantage of being home more I finally tried to commit to oil training and try a different dry shampoo...this product has really good reviews and while it is expensive it’s the best I’ve found so far! The only draw back is it does settle in kinda thick so I only use it every other day. I was my hair once a week now and it takes a little longer and more shampoo to get my hair clean...still less than washing daily.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Goodenough

customer_reviews.title: Faulty nozzles
customer_reviews.text: Nozzle broke almost immediately - have seen reviews of this product elsewhere with the same complaint. I got one use of it that seemed ok, after that wouldn't spray and no amount of rinsing the nozzle made a difference
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Best dry shampoo I’ve ever used!
customer_reviews.text: And I’ve used a TON of them over the years! The smell is great, it leaves my hair feeling actually clean. I have fine-normal hair that can sometimes be a little flat. This gives it a little texture and volume. Here are some tips for use to get the best results: Spray on per the instructions and then wait at least 30 seconds to 2 minutes before doing anything to your hair. Just let the product work. Then take your fingertips or a towel (I use a towel) and scrub your scalp. This helps to distribute it a little bit more, getting rid of any white spots (I have dark hair). Brush and style as usual.
customer_reviews.author: JELE

customer_reviews.title: Lots of pluses!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've tried a dry shampoo. Major pluses = 1. You're "day 3" hair looks just as good as your "day 1" hair 2. It smell is good 3. Seriously gets rid of ANY oily look 4. If you are a career gal, or mom who has no time, this is a life saver 5. You don't need to use much product so I'm envisioning that this bottle will last quite a while Overall, really happy!
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY - READ INGREDIENTS - NO REFUNDS- FLAMMABLE!!
customer_reviews.text: I could give this a zero I would you’re unable to return it because it’s completely flammable which is scary that they want you to put it on your hair! This smells awful and burns on your head I would not recommend this to anyone. I used one time and asked for a refund but they won’t do that because it’s flammable. My head felt gross and itchy from this and when I washed hair after use I had alot fall out!!! Worst product I ever bought on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Cdenney

customer_reviews.title: Try Drybar instead
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several dry shampoos. This is probably my least favorite. I can't really tell that it does much of anything for my hair. It seems to sit rather heavily too. The worst part is the smell. It fills the room in just a few sprays, and it's visible in the air. The smell is not necessarily a bad odor, but it's so strong I have to leave the room. I'm going back to Drybar.
customer_reviews.author: PDBR

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try this because I have literally never found a dry shampoo that works for me. I bought this based on the reviews, thinking this might be the one. I had also read a blog with a list of the best dry shampoos and this was the top of the list. However, it just makes my hair feel even dirtier and the smell was soooo strong, I couldn't take it and just washed my hair. I have fine, oily hair... I've always had to wash my hair every single day and even with that often, my hair looks greasy by the end of the day. But this stuff did not improve it at all.
customer_reviews.author: veronica2311

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff and was afraid the price had jumped up on me, but they just offer it in a bigger bottle now. Awesome!! So I don't have to buy it as often. This is the only dry shampoo that works for me. It's gold - makes my hair look clean and gives it killer volume. It's a bit drying, but that's because it's getting rid of the permanent oil slick at your roots. Makes my hair look like a rock star.
customer_reviews.author: Slowburnstudio

customer_reviews.title: I love Living Proof Dry Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I love Living Proof Dry Shampoo. I have purchased it from Sephora many other times and never had an issue. This bottle was used three times before it stopped working. It only sprays cold air and no dry shampoo. I am super disappointed and will not purchase from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Bethanya

customer_reviews.title: Does not spray- bottle broken
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive this product as I love this line of hair products. When I received it, I was able to spray dry shampoo out of the bottle, however, within just two days of having the product it no longer sprayed. The pump seems to be clogged. I am very disappointed and should be refunded or sent a new bottle that works properly. At the price point for this product, this is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Dermott T. Kehoe

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I think this product works well. However, my hair is already very dry and breaks easily (blonde). This product makes it even drier. I've decided it's actually better for my hair type to wash it daily, unless on the weekend when I don't need to style/use hairspray/curling iron. It stays healthier that way. But if you don't have dry hair, I would recommend this dry shampoo, it does work well!
customer_reviews.author: L. Sims

customer_reviews.title: Wow - BEST Dry Shampoo I’ve tried
customer_reviews.text: I am continually amazed at the quality of Living Proof’s products. I first started with their shampoo and conditioner and decided to try the dry shampoo. I’ve tried several other dry shampoos that hardly did anything for my hair oil. I’d have to spray quite a bit and it still wouldn’t look good. But that’s not the case with this dry shampoo. This stuff actually works. I only have to spray a little bit, and as soon as I start to rub it in it already looks cleaner. Definitely recommend, I already bought more to stock up on.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Must have product!
customer_reviews.text: I am really trying to grow my hair out and keep it healthy. To do that I don't want to strip natural oils by washing daily. This dry shampoo. In addition to the living proof style extender has allowed me to go 4-5 days between washes. This is also great because with three kiddos and a full time job....mama doesn't get much time in the shower! I have also used this post work out, not a soaking wet workout...but also Korean than yoga or walking.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Wenninger

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely would recommend. It's my favorite dry shampoo.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite dry shampoo I've ever used. I try to put it on the night before I'll need it, and just a tiny bit in the morning before styling or to add volume. It doesn't leave a powdery residue once you shake it out, and it doesn't leave residue in your hair afterwards like some dry shampoos. It also leaves my hair feeling soft instead of the hairspray feeling you can sometimes get with dry shampoos.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Best Dry Shampoo Ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dry shampoo I've ever used. In fact, it's the only one I'll ever use from now on. It smells AMAZING and actually soaks up the oils and makes your hair seem fresh. Most dry Shampoos I've tried just make my hair smell nice but don't actually make my hair feel or look cleaner. This one totally does. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Irina

customer_reviews.title: Super for Curly Hair
customer_reviews.text: I love the product, but definitely need to read descriptions better! This was a very small container, I was expecting a regular sized product. No one to blame but myself! The dry shampoo is perfect for my naturally curly hair. I only wash my hair twice in 8 days and use this in between. My hair never looks oily and it gives my hair volume (I have long hair and straighten it with a flat iron). Will definitely purchase a larger size next time and pay a few dollars more by ordering from Sephora.
customer_reviews.author: KMD

customer_reviews.title: Smell and the feel of your hair will be HORRIBLE!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a camping trip and absolutely hated everything about this. I will admit, I have never used a dry shampoo before so maybe they are all horrible. The smell was awful and the feel of my hair after was even worst. I could not sleep and my husband said I smelled really bad. In the middle of the night, I stuck my head in the creek for several minutes trying to get it out. That made it kind of tolerable. I would go an extra week with greasy hair before I did this again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Dornan

customer_reviews.title: Faulty bottle and won’t spray - Amazon will do nothing about it.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this dry shampoo on Amazon, used it once and was extremely happy with it. A very little spritz of it, took away any oils and left my hair smelling fresh. The next time I went to use it, it wouldn’t spray at all. I shook the van and there was clearly plenty in it but nothing came out. I made sure the nozzle wasn’t clogged - it wasn’t. Cool. Glad I spent $24 on ahair product that worked once. When I contacted amazon, they wouldn’t exchange it since it’s a “personal product” and was referred to contact the manufacture. It’s been 2 weeks without a single response from Living Proof. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: mamakback

customer_reviews.title: Works better than other products I've tried
customer_reviews.text: A co-worker recommended this one to me. I have to straighten my hair when I wear it down, and this really extends the time I can go between washing my hair and having to start over with styling. Going longer between washing also helps extend my hair color. No residue was visible, and since my co-worker is blonde, and I had very dark hair at the time, it seems to work well no matter what color your hair is!
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great dry shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I like this brand of dry shampoo. I work out every day and don’t like washing my hair every single day. I can use this and blow dry my hair to freshen up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what you expect from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: First off it is more expensive than in store not by much hence why i went for it. Second off it arrived with clear hand wrapped duct tape over the cap....so has it veen used?? So I will just go to the store from now on. Amazon is fine most of the time but more and more prices are rising and products quality and authenticity is going down. Look forward to seeing this resolve over time.
customer_reviews.author: Gabi Mae

customer_reviews.title: The best dry shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a number of dry shampoos but I think Living Proof is the best. I have white/gray hair color, all natural and I spray this in, massage it around and then brush my hair. The dry shampoo is white and matches my hair color so that is nice. This dry shampoo also gives my hair a lift and it looks fuller. It is great to use if you like to skip a day washing your hair. Nice fragrance too.
customer_reviews.author: Rita C

customer_reviews.title: Does what it promises
customer_reviews.text: The scent is not pleasing, but the power of the aerosol is perfect and the product delivers. Good for fine and darker colored hair - isn't heavy and doesn't leave any white color. My hair is fine, and blonde, but if it were anything else, I think the buyer would be happy. The scent though, it's the reason I won't buy it again if I can find a comparable product that has a better scent I will. I used this the first time and, especially because it IS right next to your face, I thought that all I could smell was "old lady flowery perfume", which I 100% didn't like.
customer_reviews.author: MsBarlow

customer_reviews.title: Love this product! Smells divine
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my bedridden stepmom who doesn’t always like an actual hair washing. The smell is amazing and the absorbing of oils is fantastic. Can’t hold it too close though or the scalp gets caked with powder. I love how full it made her hair, and as for me, the smell is fantastic and I even bought some for my bangs because of the nighttime serums I wear, they tend to get oily. This fixes them right up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best dry shampoo
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite dry shampoo. I have medium blonde hair & don’t find it leaves a white residue. Also, a key trick I learned is to actually apply it at night for the best volume results in the morning. By using this product I have been able to only was my hair once a week using this product mid week. The scent is nice, not floral or fruity, smells very clean. Not too strong or overpowering either. Great product and love that they offer the travel size.
customer_reviews.author: ALO

customer_reviews.title: One of the best I've used
customer_reviews.text: I really love this dry shampoo. I've avoided buying it due to the price, but its worth it to buy this AND a cheap brand to make it last longer - I use this at my roots where the hair is visible, then use a cheaper brand underneath where it doesn't matter if it's chalky looking. The powder blends beautifully into my dark hair, and smells AMAZING. Not too strong at all. Every time I get a hug when I use this I receive compliments on how I nice I smell. It works very well, took one star off for the price.
customer_reviews.author: E.g.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed 😔
customer_reviews.text: I had heard this was a good dry shampoo that didn't leave a powder residue so I was real excited to try it. When I received it was damaged. The product would not spray out of the nosel. I tried to put a different sprayer from an old hairspray can on it but it didn't work. The seller did not do exchanges on the product but luckily Amazon refunded my money. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ABB

customer_reviews.title: Makes fine hair oily right away
customer_reviews.text: I have the mouse from living proof so I decided to try their dry shampoo and it’s useless for my hair. I have thin hair tho abundant and have to wash it every other day without dry shampoo. By the end of the day I wore this dry shampoo, my head felt extra oily and flat so I had to wash my hair. I used the whole bottle since I didn’t want it to go to waste but instead of keeping my hair from washing, it acted more as an accelerator forcing me to wash it after a few hours of wearing the dry shampoo. Cheaper and better brands as welll. Their thickening Mousse is amazing tho!
customer_reviews.author: DaniZepp

customer_reviews.title: Best dry shampoo I’ve ever tried!
customer_reviews.text: I have super oily hair. If I don’t wash it every day it feels and looks pretty gross. I have tried countless dry shampoos and have even purchased them from salons and nothing has worked besides actually washing my hair in the shower. A friend recommended this brand to me and WOW! Hands down best dry shampoo I’ve ever tried. I can now go a day or two without washing my hair and it doesn’t have that heavy oily feeling. I’ve been telling everyone to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Jarrett

customer_reviews.title: Works great on brunettes
customer_reviews.text: I'm a brunette and this is my favorite dry shampoo. It does NOT leave white residue and it works great. You do have to use quite a bit, so it runs out quick for me but it's worth it. It also smells really good without being overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: JMac

customer_reviews.title: Practical for the woman on the go
customer_reviews.text: Having oily hair is a problem also putting product in your hair your hair gets dirty easily I don’t need to wash it every day and destroy it although the spray and powder dries up the oil it could make your hair a little damp and heavy but for a day or two just to wear it up it could actually save your hair when you were an emergency so very good product should be sold at a larger size
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Thurlow

customer_reviews.title: Irritating to the scalp!!!
customer_reviews.text: After a days of using this I noticed that my scalp was irritated, burning, itchy and then scabbed up. I’ll be tossing this one out and bringing back my cheap Suave dry shampoo that works great and doesn’t irritate.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Game changer as far as dry shampoo is concerned.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is expensive, but it really works. It smells amazing and compared to all of the other dry shampoos I have used, well there really isn’t a comparison. I have tried Dove, batiste, Not Your Morhers, Rene Furterer, and Sacha Juan, and this was the best. Yes, it will leave hair a bit stiff, but it can easily be brushed through with a boar hair brush. This was my first purchase of Living Proof, and I liked the quality so much, I bought more products from them. The only downside is you don’t get much so it doesn’t last that long.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Made my hair feel gross
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a LOT of dry shampoos and this one is right near the bottom. The scent is okay, but very strong. I followed the instructions for holding the can away from my hair and working through with my fingers after 30 seconds, but ugh my hair felt disgusting. Other dry shampoos ha e made my hair feel heavy or staticky, but this one made my hair feel like it was gunked up. I did NOT use an excessive amount, but I still felt like I needed to use extra shampoo at my next shower to get all of this product out. Terrible value for the high price. Threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: No residue left behind, adds volume!
customer_reviews.text: I hardly ever write a review. Scent got 3 stars- it has a somewhat strong scent, it could smell better but could definitely smell worse. Value got 4 stars- I dont like to spend a lot of money, had it been a few dollars cheaper for the small bottle i got it would be perfect. I will definitely buy it again tho! I have only tried the not your mothers brand? This one is perfect. No residue after its soaked in and it sprays great! It actually puts body back and you can run your fingers through it and it's not knotty. I will never use a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie civita

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY! DEFECTIVE SPRAY CAN!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give ZERO STARS I would! First of all, for some reason this took more than a week to get here even though it should have been prime two day shipping. Then when I finally get to use it, I get ONE SPRAY THEN THE CAN WONT SPRAY ANYMORE! DEFECTIVE SPRAY CAN! SUCH A WASTE OF TIME AND MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Expensive lingering stink in a bottle
customer_reviews.text: It stinks, literally. You can spray it in a restroom and walk in 15 minutes later and be choked by the lingering chemical smell. For the price it is ridiculous. You can buy similarly sized dry shampoos from Walmart for just a few dollars that don't smell half as bad. Don't waste your money on this product that provides nothing above its competition aside from the price. Could be a great new YouTube prank series if sprayed in a car.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Best dry shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: I have fine blonde hair that tends to look oily quickly. This product is a game changer for me. I honestly don't know how I went so long without it. It provides texture to my fine hair, while removing the greasy look. It does not leave a residue and smells clean. I haven't found another dry shampoo like this, it actually feels like it cleans your hair in between washes. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Charlee

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice but white powdery everywhere!!!
customer_reviews.text: What I don’t like about this product: - makes a mess (got white powder everywhere) - undifferentiated vs baby powder - didn’t effectively remove the greasy build up - spray was hard to control I liked: - it smelled nice - clear instructions on how to use
customer_reviews.author: Sahkira

customer_reviews.title: Best dry shampoo out there!
customer_reviews.text: This dry shampoo lives up to the hype. I always have it in my bathroom cabinet. As a busy mom with 2 little ones, I usually only wash my hair once a week. This helps keep it fresh and add volume. And the scent is lovely. I like to try other brands, but I always come back to Living Proof.
customer_reviews.author: Alsitalia

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best dry shampoo I have purchased. The scent is nice, doesn't seem to heavy. Per another review, I spray it along my hair line before bed without doing anything with it. It's just like I washed it the next morning. I can usually do this two nights. My hair is grey, long and fine.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce H.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After doing some research online, I found this dry shampoo as one of the top rated, so I decided to try it as I’ve used a ton over the years and I have never been super impressed. I really wanted to like this one, but ended up disappointed. It left me with white streaks (no matter how hard I tried to massage it into my scalp) and white flakes (yuck). The only reason I gave this 2 stars as opposed to 1 is because it had a decent smell and didn’t smell like strong hairspray as they so often do. I guess I’m going to stick with my dry bar shampoo!
customer_reviews.author: Jess H.

customer_reviews.title: It's pricey, but smells good and works
customer_reviews.text: This is a great scented dry shampoo. Cons: It is a little pricey. Use in moderation because it leaves white residue. Doesn't last long. And it has alot of alcohol in there. It fades my hair color faster when used often. Pros: It smells wonderful, in a pinch, this stuff works pretty well, adds volume, and gets you thru the day without oily hair.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Proof is in the title...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has the oiliest scalp and skin I've ever seen. Because of this it causes her hair to be so oily she was having to wash it every day. This product is the only one that has allowed her not to do that. She is on day 3 now with no oily hair and her hair looks fresh/smells amazing. Pretty amazing product!! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Holly guinn

customer_reviews.title: It's ok. Just ok.
customer_reviews.text: This product is identical to batiste, which I find OK. It has a very strong scent, good, but not if you are sensitive to smell. My top picks to date are #1 Bumble and Bumble, #2 Dove (yes, like the soap and good price too!!!). I have super oily, fine, straight, Light hair. This stuff gives me the same gritty feeling that batiste leaves
customer_reviews.author: Erica Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Best dry shampoo I’ve ever used!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best dry shampoo I’ve ever used. If you get too close it can leave a white cast but if you leave it in for a minute and then rub your hair, the white cast is gone and leaves your hair looking and smelling great! I love that it doesn’t leave a gross texture in your hair like most dry shampoos, and it keeps my hair clean for so long! Using this and the shampoo and conditioner of the same brand I’m able to go 7 days without washing my hair and my hair stays looking freshly washed for the whole week!
customer_reviews.author: Kim K

customer_reviews.title: Best Dry Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many different products and generally air on the side of 'a step above cheap' for hair products... but this is worth the money. No flakes, no white residue, your hair stays natural feeling and lays normally, smells good, gives volume-- it's worth the money and it's the only dry shampoo I would recommend or purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Edington

customer_reviews.title: Great product, poor value.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dry shampoo I've ever used, so I'm sad that I have to give it a bad review. It's a great product and leaves your hair feeling clean and natural. It also doesn't leave white residue on dark hair, which is awesome. However, I bought this on August 26th, used it every other day (so about 7 days total) and it ran out today, Sept 10th. It's great stuff but $24 is a lot to pay for only 7 days of use. As much as I loved it, I just don't think I can buy it again because it'll cost more than my monthly electric bill.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite dry shampoo
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for traveling. I am averse to washing my hair on vacation because it is just a huge hassle. I always bring this stuff with me and I can make it a week or longer without washing. I usually wash once a week at home but this stuff gives me a few extra days, and I don't have to take time to style my hair in such a way as to hide all the excess oil. It's a bit pricey for everyday use, but worth it to avoid lugging around a bunch of extra products when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Worst scent ever! Yikes!
customer_reviews.text: This smells so unbelievably nasty that I had to wash my hair (after getting ready to leave the house) because I felt like it would actually be disruptive at work. It’s a terrible, gross, heavy smell. I love LP and one of the best things about their products is the light, fresh, youthful scent. This is...not that. It’s so unlike their other products.
customer_reviews.author: Runohmollyrun

customer_reviews.title: Decent-ish
customer_reviews.text: Makes hair smell good, but doesn’t really help with oil. I do have long, thick hair, and switching to Head & Shoulders helped along with only using H&S dandruff shampoo and then no conditioner and then putting some Biosilk oil on the tips/ends. Sooo I did solve my oil problem, but this dry shampoo had nothing to do with it. Also, it made my scalp itchy.
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: Typical Dry Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the travel sized dry shampoo as a tester. It works as expected, however, leaves hair white/dull looking even when spraying the recommended distance away from your scalp. Also, I found less expensive products of Living Proof at Ulta.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: I love Living Proof Dry Shampoo and usually buy at Ulta ...
customer_reviews.text: I love Living Proof Dry Shampoo and usually buy at Ulta or direct from Living Proof. I jumped in this to see it on sale for $15.99, a much better price than the usual $23 I spend. I should have known it was too good to be true. Completely disappointed with the bottles that arrived today. They look different than they should and it is definitely NOT Living Proof dry shampoo in the bottle. It smells awful and leaves a tacky, sticky white residue all over my hair. I've been using Living Proof dry shampoo for over a year now , their real product does not leave residue and smells amazing.
customer_reviews.author: JKnott17

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I dislike everything about this product. I'm really glad I purchased the sample size : ( -The overwhelming smell kept me awake at night. -My hair felt coated and heavy. I had to wash my hair, which defeats the purpose I think. -I had to open all the windows just to use this and the taste in my mouth took forever to go away, it can't be good to breath this stuff in. This purchase was a fail. I would never recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do anything it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Overwhelming smell, leaves white powder everywhere. These are the 2 things I ask of dry shampoo and this product fails miserably. And, you can't return it.
customer_reviews.author: pb123

customer_reviews.title: Not half full
customer_reviews.text: Well after reading previous posts about it being half full I got mine and it seemed half full so I was mad. I ordered some shampoo and conditioner from the actual website and it came with a free dry shampoo (same size as amazons) and it felt the exact same as the one from Amazon. Soooo I don’t know if they were BOTH half full or if that’s just how they come. Either way, I do like the rice starch base, it doesn’t burn my scalp like the others. I will be buying again
customer_reviews.author: Corissa Bolle

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Spendy, any scent that is in it doesn't stay with you all day, it works better than any of the other dry shampoos I've used because it lasts! it only takes about 4-6 blasts at the root depending on what you're really trying to achieve (whole head? Me, not) I have chemically treated blond hair, so it works excellent for me so I don't have to shampoo as often. Gives it a bit if a root lift, too!
customer_reviews.author: V. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent & overpriced
customer_reviews.text: 4 purchases: First - just great. Second - didn’t work - seemed like a knock off. Third - sprayer didn’t work. Fourth - used up quickly but with good results. Overpriced & inconsistent product. If they ever get this right it would have good appeal to me - if more product in canister for @ 1/2 the price.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia E. Vancini

customer_reviews.title: Sprayer broke after 3 sprays
customer_reviews.text: I just got this and was so excited to use immediately. I sprayed it 3 different times and it will no longer spray. Not eligible to return or replace. Plenty of other dry shampoo option don’t try this one.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Can gives problems
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this item many times. However every now and then the can sling spray. I’ve been advised to place under hot tap water. It does its thing works for one or two uses and then it has to be done over and over. This time it isn’t working at all. Policy is no returns. For the cost it should be replaced. Very upset. Time to find a new product.
customer_reviews.author: Debi Zarro

customer_reviews.title: No excuse for this
customer_reviews.text: $24 for a product to come with no cap and leak during shipping. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny D.

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon removed my first review, so I’ll post again. The product is 100% fake. I buy living proof at every single Sephora VIB sale, but needed some travel sized dry shampoo last minute. I can assure you this is NOT an authentic Living Proof product, but I’m sure this review will be removed anyway.
customer_reviews.author: lizzie wright

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite dry shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I kept hearing how much people love this dry shampoo (and brand) and honestly I like Batiste more. This has a pretty strong scent, felt very heavy on my hair, and just left it feeling full of product. I don't want to feel like I have tons of product in my hair so this was not for me. Especially the price.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Blain

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite so far
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed. All I have to say! This is my favorite so far. I've used all the brands, Aveda, Amika, Not your Mother's. This is my favorite. Somewhat of a chalky residue but goes away with a little tousle. The smell is heavenly and keeps my hair fresh for another day without making it overly heavy like Aveda can sometimes do! Wish I could buy it by the case!!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Left hair with a dirty feel
customer_reviews.text: I was not happy with the way my hair felt after using the product. Worked as it should but my hair lost its silkiness. The product left a residue that makes it feel dirty or gummy. Used the product completely and attempted to adjust the amount used each time but not happy overall. Not buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: LCBD

customer_reviews.title: It's good
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bit of a dry shampoo tester and am always looking for the best product. Out of the five I have currently, I don't use this one very often. It leaves a bit more residue than if like, but it is effective. It's important to let it sit for 30 seconds and then brush it out. And don't spray it closely onto the root. It's meant to be sprayed from a distance for better distribution.
customer_reviews.author: R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Stay away if you are a brunette!!
customer_reviews.text: This dry shampoo is really bad for dark hair. You can see white residue even though you have been brushing your hair for 15 minutes straight. Stay away from it if you have dark hair. The white residue won’t be as noticeable if you do have blonde hair. Also, the scent is horrendous. It is very very strong and clashes with my perfume. I gave it away to a blonde friend. This purchase from Living Proof was a big let down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bleh!!!
customer_reviews.text: Really strong smell and makes my hair feel gross and look weird. It is a good travel size and it adds volume but there are cheaper ones out there. Damp and heavy. Would not be able to use it every day. Cap and bottle dents easily and feels almost empty after one use.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Finally, dry shampoo that works
customer_reviews.text: My baby fine hair loves this stuff. It doesn't leave it looking powdery, my hair is soft with no gunky feel, and the smell isn't overpowering. I don't know if ordering it was a jinx though. I was admitted to the hospital Sunday night and it arrived Monday. I wasn't planning on using it in this setting but I'm glad I have it since I'm hooked up to all of these wires and can't shower
customer_reviews.author: nicki0920

customer_reviews.title: Order your hair color
customer_reviews.text: Made the mistake of not ordering the shade of my hair. Lol this comes out white so while I color my hair to cover the white- this puts it back. Order your hair color - works good.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after seeing it being used in a you tube video. I think the celeb probably got paid to do an endorsement. This product doesn't work. On top of that, it's smelly and makes you cough from the fumes. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: PTM

customer_reviews.title: Necessary
customer_reviews.text: Last year: “Dry shampoo? Gross, just wash your hair.” This year: “I’m sorry, you will have to rebook the group vacation because my brand of dry shampoo in the travel size is out of stock for two more weeks.”
customer_reviews.author: Apophenia Fibonacci

customer_reviews.title: After 2 uses it doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: After using it twice, the sprayer will not work. I've cleaned the nozzle with no effect. Can't find anything else to do to correct it. Won't buy again even though I liked the product. Too expensive for 2 uses!!!! Why is it not returnable? What a rip off!
customer_reviews.author: MgirlWTX

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for not much product
customer_reviews.text: After 2 uses this tiny bottle is gone. I didn't even apply it liberally. Really disappointed in that. Aside from that, it did work quite well. I have brown hair and it smelled nice, didn't leave a white residue, and minimal build up on my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a dry shampoo that didn't leave my blonde hair with an ashy/powdery look, looking oily, and that would leave my hair looking and feeling refreshed. I experimented with several brands until I found this one. This one really works! As the name says, it's perfect, well at least for my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Smars

customer_reviews.title: THIS STUFF REALLY WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough about Living Proof hair products...My thin, fine hair is a happy camper! Expensive? Well, it IS a bit more than my budget is happy with, ,BUT...it really does take a "small amount" to do what it promises! I am a very happy camper, and thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth L

customer_reviews.title: Dries out ends
customer_reviews.text: Turned the ends of my hair into straw and gave my hair a bizarre volume that made it hard to manage. Might work better if you have naturally straight hair. Will not be buying again. I prefer Moroccan hair oil spray.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Works Ok in a pinch but the odor is unbearable
customer_reviews.text: It definitely kind of worked but the scent was impossible to live with. Even if I could bear it, my fiancé was choking whenever he got near me. Otherwise, my hair appearance was improved after using it, but it felt a little stiff and heavy like a light hairspray. I have very fine hair, and perhaps others have a different experience.
customer_reviews.author: Jdg

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many dry shampoos and this is by far the best. I have fine blonde hair and it gets very oily very quickly but this allows me to skip washing my hair at least every other day. It is easy to apply once you shake it up very well. And I have no issues with it having any sort of residue. It lasts all day too!
customer_reviews.author: Life Of Teachers

customer_reviews.title: Finally one that works!
customer_reviews.text: It works so well! This is the 4th dry shampoo brand I’ve tried and I FINALLY FOUND ONE THAT WORKS! It actually cleans your hair and scalp. I actually went to work with 3 day old dirty hair and my scalp didn’t itch and I didn’t have a greasy head. It’s amazing! Pricey but worth it!
customer_reviews.author: ATXShops

customer_reviews.title: Seem to really help clean and not make your dirty hair even dirtier
customer_reviews.text: Seem to really help clean and not make your dirty hair even dirtier
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if I never before used dry shampoo correctly or if the formulas have just improved over the years. Used as directed, I don’t get that floury, matte hair from this brand like I have from other dry shampoos. This is perfect for those emergency slept-in-now-I-don’t-have-time-to-wash-my-hair mornings (of which there are many in my life). Best not to use in a small enclosed space, as it is HEAVILY perfumed.
customer_reviews.author: hannaberry78

customer_reviews.title: Love but too expensive
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this product but it ran out so fast. The best part is that it lasts days in my hair. I only have to use it on day 2 or 3 of washing and then don’t need it again for a couple of days. I’ve never found another dry shampoo that works this well. However it ran out in just a few weeks. So really after just a few days of use. That was disappointing. I wish it didn’t cost so much.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

product_meta.title: Living proof Perfect Hair Day Dry Shampoo, 1.8 oz

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
